body: Translations please this is shit... LITERALLY 😂😂😂😂😂😂
if only it didnt have fucking shit and piss everywhere

Hello everyone this is a a preview of the first chapter of [MoonRevenge] Watashi o Mazo to Yonde English Translation the rest of the chapter is already translated and available to all my Patrons and Subscribe Stars.

Also slight change of plans from now on I will upload a Translated Page Daily to my Patreon and Subscribe Star so for only 1$ a month You’ll be able to follow the series as I translate it.

This new format will also allow me, with enough support, to work on multiple projects at the same time.

Hope you liked my work enough to pledge your support and that you’ll continue to enjoy this series.
